item.title: 4way traffic lights installed, BG have 8 days of works. Not permitted, 10th January
item.description:
BG 8 days of roadworks, total chaos as no authorisation showing on One Network. AA and all other traffic management websites not showing any evidence. Therefore not permitted roadworks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2-4, Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole on Brooklyn Road opposite Kipling Road, 10th January
item.description:
Near mini roundabout, Brooklyn Road past scouts centre opposite Kipling Road. Deep and wide, when raining and dark completely hidden. Sidewall damaged to car tyre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Brooklyn Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge not replaced yet, 10th January
item.description:
Te deck on the bridge was rotten. It was temporarily replaced. I was informed over a year ago that there is already a new bridge ready to go in but it has not been done. Is it not time it was replaced?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping block a public footpath, 10th January
item.description:
Pedestrian footpath which runs from 401 Swindon road through to the back of 14/15 Stanwick drive. There is flytipping of domestic household rubbish which is blocking the footpath. p.s there is an unused/discarded brown council bin in the locality, can you pick this up too?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Push Button stuck on Pedestrian Crossing. Regularly stopping traffic when there are no pedestrians, 10th January
item.description:
Pedestrian Crossing between Chandos House and Cheltenham College
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bath Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot Holes All Over Whittington Road, 10th January
item.description:
Terrible holes all over Whittington Road. The whole road needs resurfacing as patchwork keeps opening up. Large clumps of debris coming out of each hole. People drive down the road at speed, as a cut-through, and it is getting very dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 potholes on Hatherley Road, 10th January
item.description:
Hatherley Road by house number 30.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Hatherley Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Serious collection of potholes with sections of tarmac on pavement, 9th January
item.description:
Outside number 22 a section of tarmac has been placed on the pavement as it was sticking up from a pothole. Due to parked cars this pothole is unavoidable and will cause damage to cars driving along the road. The whole road is in an awful state every time it rains - please fix properly as a patch will cause the same issues next time it rains.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The general condition of this road is very poor and potentially dangerous., 9th January
item.description:
The entire road (Harp Hill) is in awful condition, which poses a real threat to the safety of road users and pedestrians. When will the council get a grip and actually recognise the need for these repairs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crass turning to sludge due to cars parking on grass causing my child to slip on the pathway to my garden gate, 9th January
item.description:
Grass verge the side of number 37 Grenadier Road Cheltenham it has been going on for years
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Bodnam Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Considerable size pothole, 9th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Potholes in Woodlands Road, Warden Hill., 9th January
item.description:
Potholes in Woodlands Road outside Nos 11 and 2. Heavy rainfall has scoured out former pothole repairs. Road in shocking condition. Contractors when authorised need to sweep up and take away debris.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Woodlands Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
